name: The Princess High School Life
description:
This game about princess love story. In this Princess's High school Life game, boy needs your help for propose to his girlfriend in high school. Boy is making some plan for his special day. So, Can you help him? There are various types activities that you perform like select dress up, makeover your friend, Make yummy cake, prepare lovely flower bouquet & card for her, choose a fancy engagement ring, decorate the restaurant and many more. So perform each and every activity using your skills. While playing princess's high school life game, you act as a real character and enjoy a high school life full of enthusiasm.

Features

- Wear stylish dresses
- Perform unique beauty makeover
- Enjoy romantic dinner date with a crush
- Repair a broke down car
- Enjoy and interact with high school life game
- Try different jewelry
